contesttimer
Class Team

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  contesttimer.Team
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Team
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Comparable

An object of class Teams represents one team in the programming contest and the information about each of its programming problem solutions.

See Also:
Serialized Form
